CustomField.description: [DrawLoop]: Used in Outbound Messages [Task 11630] DDP = Licensing Inspection Full Report Deploy = SMTP - ODJFS Insp Updated & SMTP - ODE Insp Updated
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "FCC - Type A Home",CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "FCC - Type B Home",CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "Child Care Center") , "SFCLQ_Inspection__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf6;Deploy:a0135000000kgnP", IF( OR(CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "Pre School",CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "School Age Child Care") , "SFCLQ_Inspection__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf6;Deploy:a0135000000kgnN", "") )
CustomField.label: DEL_Drawloop_Next Inspection Updated
